rounds.category: THEY NAMED A SCHOOL FOR ME

clues.text: MSD Strong, students at Marjory Stoneman Douglas High in this southern state know it was named for a writer & activist

Fittingly in New York, there's a college of criminal justice named for this first Chief Justice of the U.S.
Acknowledging that this Shoshone woman's name can be spelled different ways, a Seattle public school spells it with a C & a J

rounds.category: COMING BACK TO WIN THE GAME

clues.text: Facing match point in 2009's Wimbledon semis vs. Elena Dementieva, her return clipped the tape, but landed in; the title followed

rounds.comments: (Anderson: Each response is two words, one with a single and one with a double "D".)
